title: (Tues Full) Scotty McCreery Texted Bobby an Unreleased Song + Amy the Bad Driver Is Back At It + Eddie’s Vacation Dilemma + Never Gonna Get It!
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Scotty McCreery Texted Bobby an Unreleased Song + Amy the Bad Driver Is Back At It + Eddie’s Vacation Dilemma + Never Gonna Get It!
description:
Bobby got a text from Scotty McCreery with an unreleased song…this is the only place you can hear it! Eddie is debating on whether to move his vacation because of his kid’s basketball games. We offer him advice. We play a round of Never Gonna Get It: About one-third of Americans say it's been at least 10 years since they've been to one of these family-friendly places. What is it?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
